name: Tai Chi
description: This tai chi class is low impact and led by a volunteer. Learn the art of meditation in motion. All levels are welcome. Wear comfortable shoes.
fullDescription: This tai chi class is low impact and led by a volunteer. Learn the art of meditation in motion. All levels are welcome. Wear comfortable shoes.
whatTheyOffer: This tai chi class is low impact and led by a volunteer. Learn the art of meditation in motion. All levels are welcome. Wear comfortable shoes.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
